info.title: Cobrowse SDK
info.description: The Zoom Cobrowse SDK enables users to share their web browsing experience with an organization without compromising privacy and security. Collaborators can annotate and see what is being shared. Certain parts of the screen can be masked or redacted from view by the user to protect their privacy and confidentiality.

get.description:
List the total live sessions that occurred during a specified period of time. You can specify a monthly date range for this data using the `from` and `to` query parameters. The month should fall within the last six months. The report only includes one month's worth of data.
**Prerequisites:**
* Cobrowse SDK

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Used to paginate through large result sets. Zoom returns a `next_page_token` whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: session_pin
parameters.description: The Cobrowse session's pin code. Use this code to join the session.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

next_page_token.description: Used to paginate through large result sets. Zoom returns a `next_page_token` whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

session_pin.description: The Cobrowse session's pin code. Use this code to join the session.

user_id.description: The user's ID. This is a unique ID assigned to the user joining a session and is valid for only that session.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `30101`
The next page token is invalid or expired.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `401`
Invalid token.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
List the total live or past sessions that occurred during a specified period of time. You can specify a monthly date range for this data using the `from` and `to` query parameters. The month should fall within the last six months. The report only includes one month's worth of data.
**Prerequisites**:
* Cobrowse SDK

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `RESOURCE-INTENSIVE`

parameters.name: time_type
parameters.description: Enables you to search Cobrowse sessions by start or end time. By default, uses `start_time`.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
The start time and date in `yyyy-mm-dd` or `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` format.

The date range defined by the from and to parameters should be a month as the response only includes one month's worth of data. The month defined should fall within the last six months. If unspecified, returns data within the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
Required only when the `from` parameter is specified.

End time and date in `yyyy-mm-dd` or `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` format, the same format as the `from` parameter.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Used to paginate through large result sets. Zoom returns a `next_page_token` whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: session_pin
parameters.description: The Cobrowse session's pin code. Use this code to join the session.

from.description: The report's start date, in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format.

to.description: The report's end date, in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

next_page_token.description: Used to paginate through large result sets. Zoom returns a `next_page_token` whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

duration.description: The Cobrowse session's duration, in 'hh:mm:ss' format.

session_pin.description: The Cobrowse session's pin code. Use this code to join the session.

user_id.description: The user's ID. This is a unique ID assigned to the user joining a session and is valid for only that session.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `30101`
The next page token is invalid or expired.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `401`
Invalid token.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Get a information about live or past Cobrowse sessions.:
**Prerequisites:**
* Cobrowse SDK.

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: session_type
parameters.description:
The session's type.
`live` - A live session.
`past` - A past session.

session_pin.description: The Cobrowse session's pin code that can be used to join the session.

duration.description: The Cobrowse session's duration, in 'hh:mm:ss' format.

session_pin.description: The Cobrowse session's pin code that can be used to join the session.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `401`
Invalid token.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `30300`
Session does not exist: $sessionId

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
List the users from live or past sessions.

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Used to paginate through large result sets. Zoom returns a `next_page_token` whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

next_page_token.description: Used to paginate through large result sets. Zoom returns a `next_page_token` whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

users.description:
Session users.

Note:

If a user left a session and rejoined the same session, their information will appear multiple times (for each time the user joined the session).

user_connection_id.description: The connection's ID for each time the user joined the session.

user_id.description: The user's ID. This is a unique ID assigned to the user joining a session and is valid for only that session.

data_center.description:
The data center where user's session data is stored. 
`US` - United States
`AU` - Australia
`BR` - Brazil
`CA` - Canada
`DE` - Germany
`HK` - Hong Kong SAR
`IN` - India
`JP` - Japan
`CN` - Mainland China
`MX` - Mexico
`NL` - Netherlands
`SG` - Singapore
`TW` - Taiwan

join_time.description: The time at which user joined the session.

leave_time.description:
The time at which a user left the session.

For live sessions, this field is only returned if a user has left the ongoing session.

duration.description: The duration for each time the user in a same session, in 'hh:mm:ss' format.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `30101`
The next page token is invalid or expired.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `401`
Invalid token.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `30300`
Session does not exist: $sessionId

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).
